					<section><!--<ul>
                      <li>Registration for participation in the 2018 Consensus Group is closed.</li></ul>-->
                      <!--<p style="margin-left:14px; margin-top:0;">
<a target="_blank" href="http://ncpdp.org/Standards-Development/consensus-group-participation">

                     <h2>News &amp; Announcements</h2>
                      

<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-NCPDP/Member-Leadership,-Award-Voting-Continues-Have-(1)">Member Leadership, Award Voting Continues: Have You Voted? </a> Voting continues for the NCPDP Board of Trustees, the Work Group Co-Chairs, the Benjamin D. Ward Distinguished Member Award and the Rising Star Award. Please take a few moments to complete and submit the <a href="http://ncpdp.org/CMSModules/Newsletters/CMSPages/Redirect.ashx?linkguid=5a62bb09-5693-4793-8ac0-dc85b8b20b5c&amp;email=dkehr%40ncpdp.org&amp;hash=0786211d847af65fdfd806096a8aa102625bf29db344847a252e6ad1c6a73d0c" target="_blank">online ballots</a> that determine the leadership of your organization and award recipients.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-Industry/Looking-for-a-More-Efficient-Way-to-Collect-CMS-45">Looking for a More Efficient Way to Collect CMS 455 Pharmacy Disclosure and Credentialing Requirements? </a> NCPDP&rsquo;s resQ&trade; Pharmacy Credentialing Resource can help reduce time and resources needed to achieve compliance with CMS Code of Federal Regulations (CFR), specifically 42 CFR 455.104, 455.105 and 455.106 that require providers who are entering into or renewing a provider agreement to disclose to managed care organizations that contract with Medicare/Medicaid Agencies:</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-NCPDP/Annual-Conference-Sponsorships-Still-Available!"> Annual Conference Sponsorships Still Available! </a> Beat everyone else to these sponsorships, they are sure to go fast!</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-NCPDP/NCPDP’s-Klimek-to-Chair-CBI’s-Real-Time-Benefit-Ch">NCPDP’s Klimek to Chair CBI’s Real-Time Benefit Check & ePrior Authorization Summit </a> Join NCPDP&rsquo;s John Klimek, Senior Vice President of Standards and Information Technology, at CBI&rsquo;s <strong>Real-Time Benefit Check &amp; ePrior Authorization Summit</strong>, May 15-16, 2018, in Philadelphia.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-NCPDP/Apply-to-be-a-Mentor-or-Mentee-by-March-31st-(1)">Apply to be a Mentor or Mentee by March 31st </a> The next Mentorship Program starts in May 2018 and the application deadline for both mentors and mentees is March 31, 2018. Spots are limited so be sure to apply early.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-NCPDP/Emerging-Professionals-Fellowship-Opportunity">Emerging Professionals Fellowship Opportunity </a> NCPDP&rsquo;s Emerging Professional Fellowship is an exciting professional growth opportunity for one ambitious member to work closely with the NCPDP Strategic Planning Committee (SPC). Submit a completed application and include a written letter of approval from your direct supervisor, to <a href="mailto:nrussell@ncpdp.org">Nicole Russell</a> via email by <strong>March 31, 2018</strong>.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li><a itemprop="name" href="/News/News-Listing-NCPDP/WEBINAR-Quality-and-Accreditation-Initiatives-in">WEBINAR: Quality and Accreditation Initiatives in Specialty Pharmacy </a> On April 19, 2018, at 12:00 p.m. EDT, join Lynnae Mahaney, B.S., Pharm., MBA, FASHP, Director, Pharmacy Accreditation, Office of Practice Advancement, ASHP, to learn about some of the latest initiatives in specialty pharmacy.</li>
</ul>
		<a href="News/News-Listing-NCPDP" class="Footnote">News Archive</a>
</section>

<section class="Callout">
<h2>Hot Topic</h2>

<div class="CalloutBody1">&nbsp; <!--<p style="color:#005596; padding-left:10px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-top:0;"><strong>NEW! NCPDP Integrated Standards for Pharmacist-Provided Patient Care Services</strong></p>--> <a href="http://ncpdp.org/ac/regina-holliday.aspx" target="_blank"><img src="/NCPDP/media/images/HotTopic.jpg" style="margin-left:10px; box-shadow:0px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);" /></a>

<p style="font-size:.75em; line-height:1.25em; padding:0 10px; margin-top:4px;">NCPDP is excited to announce Regina Holliday as one of the its 2018 Annual Technology &amp; Business Conference, Industry United to Improve the Patient Journey, keynoters. Regina Holliday is a patient advocate and artist known for painting a series of murals depicting the need for clarity and transparency in medical records. This advocacy mission was inspired by her husband Frederick Allen Holliday II and his struggle to get appropriate care.<br />
<a href="http://ncpdp.org/ac/regina-holliday.aspx" target="_blank">Read More</a></p>
<!--<p>
				<strong>Curbing Opioid Overutilization in Medicare Part D</strong> <img alt="PDF" src="NCPDP/media/Icons/PDF.jpg" /></p>
			<p style="font-size:12px; line-height: 1.5em;">
				NCPDP&rsquo;s newest white paper offers a standardized process for sharing Medicare<br />
				Part D opioid overutilization data between plan sponsors. CMS now requires sponsors to communicate and share this information to help protect beneficiaries and reduce fraud, waste and abuse.</p>
			<a href="javascript:;" onclick="OpenForm('pdf/wp/NCPDP.Data.Sharing.of.Opioid.Overutilization.White.Paper.C.pdf');" title="Fill the Form">Download PDF</a>--></div>
</section>

<section class="Callout" style="margin-top:14px;">
<h2>Products</h2>

<div class="CalloutCarousel">
<ul class="ProductSelector">
	<li class="Active"><a href="#dataQ">dataQ<sup>&reg;</sup></a></li>
	<li><a href="#HCIdea">HCIdea<sup>&reg;</sup></a></li>
	<li><a href="#RxReconn">RxReconn<sup>&reg;</sup></a></li>
	<li><a href="#UCF">UCF<sup>&reg;</sup></a></li>
</ul>

<div class="ProductPanel" id="dataQPanel">
<ul class="ProductCarousel">
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p>Receive up-to-date, comprehensive, pharmacy information with this robust, reliable pharmacy database solution, with access to over 76,000 pharmacies, including 4,000+ non-pharmacy dispensing sites nationwide.</p>

	<p><a href="http://dataq.ncpdp.org/dataQInfo/pages/helpingEmpower.html" target="blank">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p><strong>WebConnect: A dataQ Add-on Solution.</strong> Research active/inactive NCPDP ID data, cross reference information and gain access to thousands of credentialing documents with this real-time, problem-solving, online solution.</p>

	<p><a href="http://dataq.ncpdp.org/dataQInfo/pages/dataQWebConnect.html" target="blank">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p><strong>OnDemand: A dataQ Add-on Solution.</strong> Enjoy convenience and flexibility with access to &ldquo;do-it-yourself&rdquo; reporting capabilities. Build custom queries, run ad hoc reports, and export data into your preferred format for future use or data manipulation.</p>

	<p><a href="http://dataq.ncpdp.org/dataQInfo/pages/dataQOnDemand.html" target="blank">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class="ProductPanel" id="HCIdeaPanel">
<ul class="ProductCarousel">
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p style="margin-bottom:0;">Complete claims processing and other healthcare business functions accurately, efficiently and cost-effectively with this quality relational prescriber database solution, using patented AutoVerif<em>i</em>&trade;* technology.</p>

	<p style="font-size:0.8em; line-height: 1.5em;">&nbsp; *AutoVerif<em>i</em>&trade; is a patented Medversant technology (US Patent Numbers 7,529,682 and 8,131558)</p>

	<p><a href="http://www.hcidea.org" target="blank">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p><strong>HCIdea LookUp Tool &amp; LookUp Tool Pro.</strong> Get 24/7 real-time accesses to NPI, DEA and SPI identifiers, as well as other demographic information, providing you the reliable data you need to simplify your work.</p>

	<p><a href="http://hcidea.ncpdp.org/cms/Solutions/LookUp-Tool" target="blank">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class="ProductPanel" id="RxReconnPanel">
<ul class="ProductCarousel">
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p>Bring added value to your organization and clients by advising them on the potential impact of pending healthcare legislation and regulation with customized, online monitoring of industry-related issues.</p>

	<p><a href="http://ncpdp.org/Products/RxReconn%C2%AE-Healthcare-Legislation-Tracking" target="blank">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class="ProductPanel" id="UCFPanel">
<ul class="ProductCarousel">
	<li class="CalloutSlide">
	<p>Need Healthcare/Group Health/Commercial Claim Billing Forms or Workers&rsquo; Compensation/Property and Casualty Laser Forms? Purchase your NCPDP Universal Claim Forms today through our vendor, CommuniForm.</p>

	<p><a href="Products/Universal-Claim-Forms.aspx">Read More</a></p>
	</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>





          </div>
          
          <div class="Clear"></div>
        
          <article class="FullBodyColumn">
            




    
    
    
    <div class="Clear">
      &nbsp;</div>
    <div class="PartnerProgram">
      <img alt="NCPDP-Elite Partner" src="/NCPDP/media/images/NCPDP-ElitePartner.png" style="position:relative; top:26px;" />
      <p>
		<span style="position:relative; top:8px;"><a href="https://www.covermymeds.com/main/" target="_blank"><img alt="Covermymeds logo" src="/NCPDP/media/images/covermymeds.png" width="180" height="30" /></a></span> &nbsp; <span style="position:relative; top:8px;"><a href="https://www.medversant.com/" target="_blank"><img alt="Medversant logo" src="/NCPDP/media/images/MedversantHome.png" width="180" height="30" /></a></span> <span style="position:relative; top:4px;"><a href="http://www.amerisourcebergen.com/abcnew/" target="_blank"><img alt="AmerisourceBergen" src="/NCPDP/media/images/AmerisourceBergen.jpg" /></a></span> <span style="position:relative; top:4px;"><a href="https://www.jnj.com/" target="_blank"><img src="/NCPDP/media/images/JohnsonandJohnson.jpg" /></a></span> <span><a href="https://hub.pharmacyfocus.com/" target="_blank"><img src="/NCPDP/media/images/hubpharmacyfocus-EP.png" /></a></span></p>
      <p>
        NCPDP&rsquo;s Elite Partner Program establishes the highest level of sustained support for the valuable work of NCPDP in advancing patient safety and interoperability.</p>
    </div>
